message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_RDO
message.locale: A rules data object cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_OBJECTIVE_GROUP
message.locale: An objective group cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_OBJECTIVE_LIST_GROUP
message.locale: An objective list group cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_RULE_GROUP
message.locale: A rule group cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_RULE_LIST_GROUP
message.locale: A rule list group cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_DELETE
message.locale: A live rule set cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_DELETE_OBJECTIVE
message.locale: The objective cannot be removed as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_DELETE_OBJECTIVE_TAG
message.locale: The objective tag cannot be removed as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_DELETE_RULES_DATA_OBJECTS
message.locale: The rules data object cannot be removed as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_DELETE_SUB_RULE_SET_LINK
message.locale: The sub rule set link cannot be removed from as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_CONJUNCTION
message.locale: The conjunction cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_PRIORITY
message.locale: The priority cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_EXECUTION_MODE
message.locale: The execution mode cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_QUERY_MODE
message.locale: The assessment query mode cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_LIST_RULES_DATA_OBJECT
message.locale: The list rules data object cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_LOOP_EXECUTION_MODE
message.locale: The loop execution mode cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_TYPE
message.locale: The type cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_FC_TYPE
message.locale: The financial component type cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_TARGET
message.locale: The target cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_TARGET_IDENTIFIER
message.locale: The target identifier cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_VALUE
message.locale: The value cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_FREQUENCY
message.locale: The frequency cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_REASSESSMENT_IND
message.locale: The exclude from reassessment setting cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_SUB_RULES_SET
message.locale: A sub rule set cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_OBJECTIVE_TAG
message.locale: The objective tag cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_RULE
message.locale: A rule cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_RULE_DATA_ITEM_CONDITION
message.locale: A rule data item condition cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_RULE_FUNCTION_CONDITION
message.locale: A rule function condition cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_SUB_RULE_SET
message.locale: A sub rule set cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_DATA_ASSIGNMENT
message.locale: The data assignment cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_DATA_ITEM_CONDITION
message.locale: The data item condition cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_RULE_FUNCTION_CONDITION
message.locale: The rule function condition cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_MODIFY_SUB_RULE_SETS
message.locale: The sub rule set cannot be modified as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_OBJECTIVE
message.locale: The objective cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_ASSESSMENT_OBJECTIVE_TAG
message.locale: The assessment objective tag cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_DELETE_NODE
message.locale: This deletion cannot take place as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_DATA_ASSIGNMENT
message.locale: The data assignment cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_PRODUCT_OBJECTIVE_TAG
message.locale: The product objective tag cannot be added as the rule set is live.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_SIMULATION_WITH_INCORRECT_DATEFORMAT
message.locale: Incorrect date format is entered. The correct format should be YYYYMMDD.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_SIMULATION_WITH_INCORRECT_DATETIMEFORMAT
message.locale: Incorrect date time format is entered. The correct format should be YYYYMMDDhhmmss.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_SIMULATION_WITH_INCORRECT_FREQUENCYPATTERN
message.locale: Incorrect frequency pattern is entered. The correct pattern should be a 9-digit number.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_SIMULATION_WITH_INCORRECT_BOOLEAN
message.locale: Incorrect boolean is entered.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_SIMULATION_WITH_INCORRECT_NUMBER
message.locale: Incorrect number is entered.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_SIMULATION_WITH_NOVALUE
message.locale: A value is missing.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_CANT_ADD_SIMULATION_WITH_INCORRECT_MONEY
message.locale: Incorrect money value entered.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_NOT_ALPHANUMERIC
message.locale: 'Rule Set ID' must be alphanumeric with no spaces

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_SUB_RULE_SET_REFERENCED_IN_OTHER_RULESET
message.locale: This Sub Rule Set may currently be used in other rule sets: %1s.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_ONE_RULE_GROUP_AT_ROOT_LEVEL
message.locale: It is only possible to have one rule group at the root level.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_ONE_RULE_LIST_GROUP_AT_ROOT_LEVEL
message.locale: It is only possible to have one rule list group at the root level.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_ONE_OBJECTIVE_GROUP_AT_ROOT_LEVEL
message.locale: It is only possible to have one objective group at the root level.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_ONE_OBJECTIVE_LIST_GROUP_AT_ROOT_LEVEL
message.locale: It is only possible to have one objective list group at the root level.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_XRV_ONLY_ONE_TOP_LEVEL_NODE_FOR_SUB_RULE_SET
message.locale: The top-level node of a Sub Rule Set must be a Rule Group,a Rule List Group,an Objective Group or an Objective List Group.

message.name: ERR_RULES_EDITOR_RUN_ID_DATAITEM_FINAL
message.locale: Data item value cannot be set again as its parent RDO is declared final.
